OperationInfoBase Class

Definition

The base class used for storing information for a contract operation defined in a workflow service.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public abstract class OperationInfoBase : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.
